text: was a Japanese actress and singer. She was known for her roles in The Pornographers, Warm Water Under a Red Bridge, and The Ballad of Narayama.Festival de Cannes : Film details 1983 Festival de Cannes Retrieved August 2, 2008 She was born in Osaka, Japan. Sakamoto died on January 23, 2021 from a cerebral infarction in Kumamoto, Japan at the age of 84.坂本スミ子さん死去 「楢山節考」「夢であいましょう」出演 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese stage actors Category:Actors from Osaka Category:Singers from Osaka Category:Deaths from cerebral infarction
title: Sumiko Sakamoto
